ValidationRule.description: When the status field = On Hold, Sub-Status field becomes mandatory
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Status,'On Hold'),ISPICKVAL(Status,'On Hold CBT'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'On Hold Escalated')), ISPICKVAL( Sub_Status__c ,'') && $RecordType.Name != 'GDC Accounts' && $RecordType.Name != 'GDC Call' && $RecordType.Name != 'GDC Operations Email' && $RecordType.Name !='GDC Tech Issue' && $RecordType.Name !='HAPP Contract' && $RecordType.Name !='MSP Contract' && $RecordType.Name !='NavDB' && $RecordType.Name !='' && $RecordType.Name !='Zing' && $RecordType.Id !=$Label.GDCFlightOpsIssue && $RecordType.Name !='CSM Toolbox' && $RecordType.Name!='Repair & Overhaul' && $RecordType.Name!='D&S Quotes Orders', $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a Sub Status value when the Status is On-Hold
